jcr:content.jcr:title: List of organisations associated with the Conservative Party (UK)

contentheadline.headline: List of organisations associated with the Conservative Party (UK)

contentrichtext.text: This is a '''list of organisations that are associated with the British [[Conservative Party (UK)|Conservative Party]]'''. Some are official party organisations, others are organisations made up of party members which are not officially recognised by the party. ==Current== *[[Alliance of European Conservatives and Reformists]] *[[Association of Conservative Clubs]] *[[Bow Group]] *[[Bruges Group]] *[[Blue Collar Conservatives Group]] *[[Carlton Club]] *[[C-Change]] *[[Centre for Policy Studies]] *[[Centre for Social Justice]] *[[Connect (trade union)|Connect]] *[[Conservative Animal Welfare Group]] *[[Conservative Business Relations]] *[[Conservative Campaign Headquarters]] *[[Conservative Christian Fellowship]] *[[Conservative Countryside Forum]] *[[Conservative Disability Group]] *[[Conservative Europe Group]] **Young Conservative Europe Group *[[Conservative Foreign and Commonwealth Council]] *[[Conservative Friends of Balngladesh]] *[[Conservative Friends of Gibraltar]] *[[Conservative Friends of India]] *[[Conservative Friends of International Development]] *[[Conservative Friends of Israel]] *[[Conservative Friends of Pakistan]] *[[Conservative Friends of Poland]] * [[Conservative Frineds of Russia]] *[[Conservative Friends of Turkey]] *[[Conservative Friends of the Union]] *[[Conservative Future]] *[[Conservative History Group]] *[[Conservative Humanist Association]] *[[Conservative Mainstream]] *[[Conservative Medical Society]] *[[Conservative Middle East Council]] *[[Conservative Muslim Forum]] *[[Conservative National Education Society]] *[[Conservative National Property Advisory Committee]] *[[Conservative Party Archive Trust]] *[[Conservative Research Department]] *[[Conservative Rural Action Group]] *[[Conservative Technology Forum]] *[[Conservative Trade Unionists]] *[[Conservative Transport Group]] *[[Conservative Voice]] *[[Conservative Way Forward]] *[[Conservative Women's Organisation]] *[[Conservatives 4 Cities]] *[[Conservatives at Work]] *[[Conservatives for International Travel]] *[[Cornerstone Group]] *[[Countryside Alliance]] *[[Deep Blue (organisation)|Deep Blue]] *[[European Foundation (think tank)|European Foundation]] *Foreign Affairs Forum of the Conservative Party *[[Free Enterprise Group]] *[[Fresh Start]] *[[International Democrat Union]] *[[International Young Democrat Union]] * [[European Young Conservatives]] *[[LGBTory]] *[http://www.conservativesabroad.org/content/south-africa The Macmillan Club of Capetown, South Africa] *[[Margaret Thatcher Foundation]] *[[Monday Club]] *[[No Campaign]] *[[No Turning Back (political group)|No Turning Back]] *[[Policy Exchange]] *[[Reform (think tank)]] *[[Society of Conservative Lawyers]] *[[The Freedom Association]] *[[Tory Green Initiative]] *[[Tory Reform Group]] *[[The Other Club]] *[[UCUNF]] *[[Renewing One Nation]] *[[Young Britons Foundation]] *[[92 Group]] *[[2020 Group]] *[[40 Group]] *[[301 Group]] ==Former== *[[The Atlantic Bridge]] *[[Citizen Party (Bristol)]] *[[European Democrats]] *[[Conservative Centre Forward]] *[[Junior Carlton Club]] *[[Municipal Reform Party]] *[[National Union of Conservative and Unionist Associations]] *[[Primrose League]] ==External links== Of Organisations Associated With The Conservative Party (Uk)}} [[Category:Conservative Party (UK)-related lists|Organisations]] [[Category:Political party factions in the United Kingdom]]
